hero.subtitle: Fostering collaboration, democratizing knowledge, and empowering the next generation of quantum pioneers across Egypt.

quantumIntro.title: Why
quantumIntro.subtitle: We are shifting from the era of Bit to the era of Qubit. Here is how quantum computing changes the game.

superposition.title: Superposition
superposition.desc: Unlike classical bits (0 or 1), Qubits can exist in multiple states at once, unlocking parallel processing power beyond imagination.

entanglement.title: Entanglement
entanglement.desc: Particles linked across space instantly affect each other. Einstein called it 'spooky action at a distance'â€”we call it the future of communication.

exponentialSpeed.title: Exponential Speed
exponentialSpeed.desc: Solving complex problems in seconds that would take today's supercomputers thousands of years to crack.

services.title: Our Key
services.subtitle: Discover how EgQCC is building the ecosystem for the next generation of quantum pioneers.

education.title: Education & Training
education.desc: From seasonal schools to internationally recognized certifications (QBronze, QNickel), we provide world-class training to master quantum computing and AI.

events.title: Events & Hackathons
events.desc: Join Egypt's National Quantum Hackathon, weekly workshops, and interactive meetups to compete, collaborate, and connect with industry experts.

universityChapters.title: University Chapters
universityChapters.desc: A network of student hubs across Egyptian universities, providing direct access to IBM Quantum, research mentorship, and a global community of innovators.

share.text: Check out this event: {title} by EgQCC!

footer.missionLine2: Our mission is to empower one million students with Quantum Computing by 2026.

teamPage.subtitle: This archive is made possible by community members who contribute their time and expertise.

resourcesPage.subtitle: Curated links, books, and tools to help you master quantum computing, whether you are just starting or conducting advanced research.
